Dashboard.Name: Manufacturing Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard shows, Production Quantity Vs Target Quantity- Current month, Rework Quantity - Current month vs Last Month, Manufacturing cost - Current Month vs Last Month and Labor Cost - Current Month vs Last Month, Run Time Vs Down Time in each Line (Hours) - Current Month, Production Quantity - Last 12 Months, Availability, Performance, Quality and Overall Equipment Effectiveness of Process.

Dashboard.Name: Marketing Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Company A is selling different varieties of skating boards. This dashboard shows Current Month details of Adcost, Clicks, Impressions, Leads, Cost per 1000 Impressions(CPM), Cost per Lead (CPL), Cost per Click (CPC), Click Through Rate (CTR), Return on Investment (ROI), Leads vs Won by Month, CPC vs CPM vs CPL by Month, Visitors vs New Visitors by Month.

Dashboard.Name: Online Food Ordering Analysis
Dashboard.Description: This Dashboard shows, Current Month details of Total Revenue, Total Expense, Bounces – Web Site, Entrances – Web Site, Total Customers Downloading the App, Order Accuracy, Total Restaurant by City, Web Site Vs Mobile App Orders - Last 3 Months, Total Orders by City - Last 3 Months, Rate of Return, Customer Rating vs Delivery Time in Minutes by Restaurant, Customer Satisfaction Rate, Refund % with Reason

Dashboard.Name: Sales Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard gives you insight over the Revenue and Expense details, Online vs. Store Sales comparison, Region-wise Revenue and Predicted Revenue for next 3 months.

Dashboard.Name: Telecom Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard shows the details of Subscribers, Current Year -Total Revenue and Total Expense, Total Subscriber by State, Subscriber Segmentation by Service Type and Text, Voice and Data Service Utilization by Quarter and Network Utilization by Subscribers per Month.Churn Rate: The churn rate, also known as the rate of attrition, is the percentage of subscribers to a service who discontinue their subscriptions to that service within a given time period.
